mip.description: C4MIP is a suite of idealised, historical and future scenario experiments that investigate the radiative and biogeochemical effects of changing carbon dioxide concentrations.
mip.keywords: carbon cycle, earth system model, biogeochemical effects, century-scale change
mip.label: C4MIP
mip.rationale: Understanding and quantifying future century-scale changes in the global carbon cycle and its feedback on the climate system, making the link between CO2 emissions and climate change.

1pctCO2Ndep.description: Fully-coupled concentration driven 1% per year increasing CO2 up to 4XCO2 simulation with time varying nitrogen deposition.  Only applicable to models whose simulation will be affected by the deposition of reactive nitrogen either due to terrestrial or marine nitrogen cycle effects on carbon fluxes and store.
1pctCO2Ndep.keywords: C4MIP, Tier2, CO2, 1 percent per year, until quadrupling, until 4XCO2, time varying nitrogen deposition, fully coupled
1pctCO2Ndep.long_name: 1 percent per year increasing CO2 experiment with increasing N-deposition
1pctCO2Ndep.rationale: Additional feedback simulations for models with an interactive nitrogen cycle.

ssp585-bgc.description: SSP-based RCP scenario with high radiative forcing by the end of century. Following approximately RCP8.5 global forcing pathway with SSP5 socioeconomic conditions. Concentration-driven.  Radiative effects of CO2 disabled - i.e. the radiation code is fed the time-invariant CO2 concentration from the control run.
ssp585-bgc.keywords: C4MIP, Tier 2, Scenario, SSP5, RCP8.5, concentration-driven, 1850 CO2 for radiation
ssp585-bgc.long_name: biogeochemically-coupled version of the updated emission-driven RCP8.5 based on SSP5
ssp585-bgc.rationale: Assessment of CO2-carbon cycle feedbacks over the 21st century and assessment of CO2 induced warming.

esm-ssp585.description: Emission driven future scenario (SSP-based RCP SSP5-8.5) up to 2100. Starting conditions taken from emissions-driven Historical simulation.
esm-ssp585.keywords: C4MIP, Tier 1, Scenario, SSP5, RCP8.5, emission driven
esm-ssp585.long_name: update of emission-driven RCP8.5 based on SSP5
esm-ssp585.rationale: For analysis of impact of carbon cycle feedbacks on climate projections over the 21st century, and for assessment of cumulative emissions compatible with climate targets.

ssp585-bgcExt.description: Long-term extension, beyond 2100,  for the SSP5-8.5 scenario.   Emissions are eventually reduced to a level that is found to produce equilibrated radiative forcing at a relatively high level by 2300 in a simple climate model. Concentration-driven. Radiative effects of CO2 disabled - i.e. the radiation code is fed the time-invariant CO2 concentration from the control run.
ssp585-bgcExt.keywords: C4MIP, Tier 2, Scenario, SSP5, RCP8.5 extension, concentration-driven, 1850 CO2 for radiation
ssp585-bgcExt.long_name: extension of biogeochemically-coupled version of the updated emission-driven RCP8.5 based on SSP5
ssp585-bgcExt.rationale: To assess long-term CO2-carbon cycle feedbacks and CO2 induced warming associated with a high forcing scenario.

ssp534-over-bgc.description: Biogeochemically-coupled version of the mitigated overshoot scenario with medium/low radiative forcing by the end of the 21st century.  The scenario follows SSP5-8.5, an unmitigated baseline scenario, through 2040, and then substantially negative net emissions thereafter.
ssp534-over-bgc.keywords: C4MIP, Tier 2, Scenario, SSP, RCP, SSP5, RCP3.4, RCP8.5, overshoot, future, SSP-based RCP
ssp534-over-bgc.long_name: biogeochemically-coupled version of the RCP3.4 overshoot scenario branching from SSP58.5
ssp534-over-bgc.rationale: Explore the climate science and policy implications of a peak and decline in forcing during the 21st century.  This scenario fills a gap in existing climate simulations by investigating the implications of a substantial 21st century overshoot in radiative forcing relative to a longer-term target.

esm-hist.description:
Simulation of recent past (1850 to 2014) with atmospheric CO2 concentration calculated.
Impose changing conditions (consistent with observations). To be performed with an Earth System Model (ESM) that can calculate atmospheric CO2 concentration and account for the fluxes of CO2 between the atmosphere, the ocean, and biosphere.
esm-hist.keywords: CMIP, Tier 1, CMIP6,  Historical, Reference, ESM, Earth System Model
esm-hist.long_name: all forcing simulation of the recent past with an Earth system model
esm-hist.rationale: Spans the period of extensive instrumental temperature measurements from 1850 to the present. Evaluate model performance against present climate and observed climate change.

piControl.description: A pre-inudsutrial control simulation with non-evolving pre-industrial conditions. Conditions chosen to be representative of the period prior to the onset of large-scale industrialization, with 1850 being the reference year.  The piControl starts after an initial climate spin-up, during which the climate begins to come into balance with the forcing. The recommended minimum length for the piControl is 500 years.
piControl.keywords: CMIP, Tier 1, DECK, Diagnosis Evaluation and Characterization of Klima (Climate), pre-industrial, reference, control, climate,
piControl.rationale: Control experiment against which perturbations are compared, it serves as a baseline for experiments that branch from it.  To allow us to determine unforced model variability.  The control experiment should be long enough to extend to the furthest point in time reached by the end of the perturbation experiments,  thus the control should allow us to subtract any residual, unforced drift from all perturbation simulations.

1pctCO2Ndep-bgc.description: Biogeochemically-coupled concentration driven 1% per year increasing CO2 up to 4XCO2 simulation. CO2 increase only affects carbon cycle models, radiative code sees pre-industrial CO2.  With time varying anthropogenic nitrogen deposition.  Only applicable to models whose simulation will be affected by the deposition of reactive nitrogen either due to terrestrial or marine nitrogen cycle effects on carbon fluxes and store.
1pctCO2Ndep-bgc.keywords: C4MIP, Tier2, CO2, 1 percent per year, until quadrupling, until 4XCO2, time varying nitrogen deposition, biogeochemical coupling
1pctCO2Ndep-bgc.long_name: biogeochemically-coupled version of 1 percent per year increasing CO2 experiment with increasing N-deposition
1pctCO2Ndep-bgc.rationale: Additional feedback simulations for models with an interactive nitrogen cycle.

ssp534-over-bgcExt.description:
Long-term extension, beyond 2100,  for the SSP5-3.4 overshoot scenario.  The negative CO2 emissions level reached in 2100 remains constant at that level to 2150 and then  increases linearly to zero by 2250. Concentration-driven. 
The scenario can be seen as an overshoot of the 3.4 W/m2 level (which it exceeds and then returns to by about 2100) and an overshoot of the 2.6 W/m2 level, which it returns to in the 23rd century.
ssp534-over-bgcExt.keywords: C4MIP, Tier 2, Scenario, SSP5, RCP3.4 extension, concentration-driven, 1850 CO2 for radiation
ssp534-over-bgcExt.long_name: extension of biogeochemically-coupled version of the updated emission-driven RCP3.4 overshoot scenario based on SSP5
ssp534-over-bgcExt.rationale: To consider the implications of rapid decarbonisation. To allow investigation of questions related to climate change beyond 2100. To address questions of long term feedbacks and reversibility which might not be apparent from shorter simulations.

historical.description:
Simulation of recent past (1850 to 2014). 
Impose changing conditions (consistent with observations). Should be initialised from a point early enough in the pre-industrial control run to ensure that the end of all the perturbed runs branching from the end of this historical run end before the end of the control.
historical.long_name: all-forcing simulation of the recent past
historical.rationale: Spans the period of extensive instrumental temperature measurements from 1850 to the present. Evaluate model performance against present climate and observed climate change.

hist-bgc.description: Historical, concentration-driven, simulation parallel to standard Historical run, but with radiative effects of CO2 disabled - i.e. the radiation code is fed the time-invariant CO2 concentration from the control run.
hist-bgc.keywords: C4MIP, Tier 2, historical perturbation, historical forcing, 1850 CO2 for radiation
hist-bgc.long_name: biogeochemically-coupled version of the simulation of the recent past with CO2 concentration prescribed
hist-bgc.rationale: Assessment of CO2-carbon cycle feedbacks over the 21st century and assessment of CO2 induced warming.

1pctCO2-bgc.description: Biogeochemically-coupled version of 1% per year increasing CO2 up to 4XCO2 simulation. CO2 increase only affects carbon cycle models, radiative code sees pre-industrial CO2. Nitrogen deposition held fixed at pre-industrial values.
1pctCO2-bgc.keywords: C4MIP, Tier1, CO2, 1 percent per year, until quadrupling, until 4XCO2, biogeochemical coupling
1pctCO2-bgc.long_name: biogeochemically-coupled version of 1 percent per year increasing CO2 experiment
1pctCO2-bgc.rationale: Quantify the carbon cycle feedback in a model.

1pctCO2-rad.description: Radiatively-coupled version of 1% per year increasing CO2 up to 4XCO2 simulation. CO2 increase only affects the radiative code, carbon cycle models see pre-industrial CO2. Nitrogen deposition held fixed at pre-industrial values.
1pctCO2-rad.keywords: C4MIP, Tier2, CO2, 1 percent per year, until quadrupling, until 4XCO2, radiative coupling,
1pctCO2-rad.long_name: radiatively-coupled version of 1 percent per year increasing CO2 experiment
1pctCO2-rad.rationale: For further C4MIP climate-carbon cycle feedback analysis (non-linearities/synergies).

ssp585.description: SSP-based RCP scenario with high radiative forcing by the end of century. Following approximately RCP8.5 global forcing pathway with SSP5 socioeconomic conditions. Concentration-driven.
ssp585.keywords: ScenarioMIP, Tier 1, Scenario, SSP, RCP, SSP5, RCP8.5, future, High forcing, SSP-based RCP
ssp585.long_name: update of RCP8.5 based on SSP5
ssp585.rationale: The scenario represents the high end of plausible future pathways. SSP5 is the only SSP with emissions high enough to produce the 8.5 W/m2 level of forcing in 2100.

1pctCO2.description: 1 percent per year increase in the concentration of atmospheric carbon dioxide until quadrupling.
1pctCO2.keywords: CMIP, Tier 1, DECK,  Diagnosis Evaluation and Characterization of Klima (Climate), CO2 1 percent per year increase, 1pctCO2, quadrupling, climate sensitivity
1pctCO2.long_name: 1 percent per year increase in CO2
1pctCO2.rationale: Serves as a consistent and useful benchmark for analysing model transient climate response (TCR). The TCR takes into account the rate of ocean heat uptake which governs the pace of all time-evolving climate change. In Earth System Models (ESMs) that include explicit representation of the carbon cycle this experiment allows the calculation of the transient climate response to cumulative carbon emissions (TCRE) to be calculated.

esm-piControl.description: A pre-inudsutrial control simulation with non-evolving pre-industrial conditions and atmospheric CO2 calculated. Conditions chosen to be representative of the period prior to the onset of large-scale industrialization, with 1850 being the reference year.  The piControl starts after an initial climate spin-up, during which the climate begins to come into balance with the forcing. The recommended minimum length for the piControl is 500 years. To be performed with an Earth System Model (ESM) that can calculate atmospheric CO2 concentration and account for the fluxes of CO2 between the atmosphere, the ocean, and biosphere.
esm-piControl.keywords: CMIP, Tier 1, DECK, Diagnosis Evaluation and Characterization of Klima (Climate), pre-industrial, reference, control, climate, ESM, Earth System Model
esm-piControl.rationale: Control experiment against which perturbations are compared, it serves as a base- line for experiments that branch from it.  To allow us to determine unforced model variability.

anthropNdep.data_link: IGAC/SPARC Chemistry-Climate Model Initiative (CCMI) Forcing Databases in Support of CMIP6
anthropNdep.description: Impose time varying (transient) anthropogenic nitrogen (N) deposition.
anthropNdep.label: Anthropogenic Nitrogen Deposition

AOGCMconfiguration.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model
AOGCMconfiguration.label: AOGCM Configuration

HistoricalLandUse.data_link: Land Use Harmonisation (LUH2 v1.0h) land use forcing data (850-2100)
HistoricalLandUse.description: Apply the global gridded land-use forcing datasets to link historical land-use data and future projections.  This new generation of “land use harmonization” (LUH2) builds upon past work from CMIP5, and includes updated inputs, higher spatial resolution, more detailed land-use transitions, and the addition of important agricultural management layers.
HistoricalLandUse.label: Historical Land Use

rcp85extForcing.description: Impose RCP8.5 extension forcing. Emissions are reduced linearly starting in 2100 to less than 10 GtCO2/yr in 2250, a level that is estimated to produce equilibrated radiative forcing at a high level (around 14 W/m2) over the period 2200-2300.
rcp85extForcing.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway, 8.5 extension, future, scenario, SSP5, RCP8.5 extension
rcp85extForcing.label: RCP85 extension Forcing

HistoricalSolarIrradiance.data_link: SOLARIS-HEPPA Solar Forcing Data for CMIP6
HistoricalSolarIrradiance.description: The standard solar forcing dataset recommended for usage is the solar reference scenario dataset which consists of historical reconstructions (1850-2014).  Includes total solar irradiance, F10.7 cm solar radio flux, and spectral solar irradiance for 10-100000 nm range.
HistoricalSolarIrradiance.keywords: Solar Forcing, Historical, Solar, Spectral Irradiance, SSI, TSI
HistoricalSolarIrradiance.label: Historical Solar Irradiance Forcing

ssp585-bgc-Initialisation2040.description: Initialisation is from year 2040 of the ssp585-bgc experiment.
ssp585-bgc-Initialisation2040.label: SSP585-bgc-Initialisation2040

piSolarParticleForcing.description: Pre-Industrial solar particle forcing (1850-1873 mean). For models with interactive stratospheric chemstiry.  Proton forcing: HOx and NOx production by solar protons. Electron forcing:  Kp- or Ap-index to describe ionisation from electron precipitation in the lower thermosphere and upper mesosphere. Cosmic ray forcing:  ion-pair produciont by galactic gosmic rays.  CMIP6 models that do not have interactive chemistry should  prescribe the CMIP6 recommended ozone forcing data set.
piSolarParticleForcing.keywords: Solar forcing, Pre-Industrial, pi, Particle forcing, proton forcing, electron forcing, cosmic ray ionisation
piSolarParticleForcing.label: Pre-Industrial Solar Particle Forcing

HistoricalAerosolForcing.description: Mass mixing ratio fields at 1x1 degree resolution for main aerosol components (sulphate, black carbon, organic carbon, nitrate, sea salt, mineral dust),  along with effective radius per species.
HistoricalAerosolForcing.label: Historical Aerosol Forcing

RCP85aerpreEm.description: Impose changing emissions of RCP8.5 aerosol precursors.
RCP85aerpreEm.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 8.5, future, 21st century, SSP5, RCP8.5, NTCF, Aerosol Precursors, Emissions
RCP85aerpreEm.label: RCP85 Aerosol Precursor Emissions

1%CO2CarbonCycle.description: 1% per year increase in the concentration of atmospheric carbon dioxide until quadrupling seen by carbon cycle only.
1%CO2CarbonCycle.label: 1% per year CO2 for Carbon Cycle

RCP85slsEm.description: Impose changing emissions of RCP8.5 short lived gas species.
RCP85slsEm.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 8.5, future, 21st century, SSP5, RCP8.5, NTCF, Short-lived Gas, Emissions
RCP85slsEm.label: RCP85 Short Lived Gas Species Emissions

ESMconfiguration.description: Use a fully coupled Earth system model
ESMconfiguration.label: ESM Configuration

rcp85Forcing.description:
Impose RCP8.5 forcing.
Represents the high end of the range of plausible future forcing pathways.
rcp85Forcing.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 8.5, future, 21st century, SSP5, RCP8.5
rcp85Forcing.label: RCP85 Forcing

HistoricalInitialisation.description: Initialisation is from the end of the Historical experiment.  To provide continuity between simulations of the recent past and  future scenario simulations.
HistoricalInitialisation.label: HistoricalInitialisation

200yrs2101-2300.description: Future scenario, begin in 2101 and run for 200 years
200yrs2101-2300.label: 2101-2300 200yrs

1850CO2Radiation.description: Impose repeating 1850 carbon dioxide (CO2) concentrations to radiative code.
1850CO2Radiation.keywords: 1850, CO2, concentration, pre-industrial, radiation code only
1850CO2Radiation.label: 1850 CO2 for Radiation

165yrs1850-2014.keywords: 1850, 2014, Historical, Recent Past, pre-industrial to present, IPCC
165yrs1850-2014.label: 1850-2014 165yrs

1850NitrogenDep.data_link: IGAC/SPARC Chemistry-Climate Model Initiative (CCMI) Forcing Databases in Support of CMIP6
1850NitrogenDep.description: Nitrogen deposition held fixed at pre-industrial values.
1850NitrogenDep.label: 1850 Nitrogen Deposition

rcp34overForcing.description: Impose RCP3.4 overshoot forcing.  Beginning in 2040, reduce forcings from the 8.5 W/m2 pathway to 3.4 W/m2 by 2100.
rcp34overForcing.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 3.4, future, 21st century, SSP5, RCP3.4 overshoot
rcp34overForcing.label: RCP34 overshoot Forcing

ssp534-over-bgc-Initialisation.description: Initialisation is from the end of the ssp534-over-bgc experiment.
ssp534-over-bgc-Initialisation.label: SSP534-over-bgc-Initialisation

HistoricalSolarParticleForcing.description: Historical solar particle forcing (1850-2014). For models with interactive stratospheric chemstiry.  Proton forcing: HOx and NOx production by solar protons. Electron forcing:  Kp- or Ap-index to describe ionisation from electron precipitation in the lower thermosphere and upper mesosphere. Cosmic ray forcing:  ion-pair produciont by galactic gosmic rays.  CMIP6 models that do not have interactive chemistry should  prescribe the CMIP6 recommended ozone forcing data set.
HistoricalSolarParticleForcing.keywords: Solar forcing, Historical, Particle forcing, proton forcing, electron forcing, cosmic ray ionisation
HistoricalSolarParticleForcing.label: Historical Solar Particle Forcing

FutureSolarParticleForcing.description: Future solar particle forcing (2015-2299). For models with interactive stratospheric chemstiry.  Proton forcing: HOx and NOx production by solar protons. Electron forcing:  Kp- or Ap-index to describe ionisation from electron precipitation in the lower thermosphere and upper mesosphere. Cosmic ray forcing:  ion-pair produciont by galactic gosmic rays.  CMIP6 models that do not have interactive chemistry should  prescribe the CMIP6 recommended ozone forcing data set.
FutureSolarParticleForcing.keywords: Solar forcing, Future, Particle forcing, proton forcing, electron forcing, cosmic ray ionisation
FutureSolarParticleForcing.label: Future Solar Particle Forcing

PreIndustrialInitialisation.description: Initialisation from the pre-industrial control simulation.
PreIndustrialInitialisation.label: PreIndustrialInitialisation

ssp585-bgc-Initialisation.description: Initialisation is from the end of the ssp585-bgc experiment.
ssp585-bgc-Initialisation.label: SSP585-bgc-Initialisation

150yrs1850-1999.description: Begin in 1850 and run for 150 years.
150yrs1850-1999.label: 1850-1999 150yrs

1%CO2Radiation.description: 1% per year increase in the concentration of atmospheric carbon dioxide until quadrupling seen by radiative code only.
1%CO2Radiation.label: 1% per year CO2 for Radiation

HistoricalO3andStratosphericH2OConcentra.description: An ozone concentration database encompassing both the stratosphere and the troposphere and a stratospheric water vapour concentration database.
HistoricalO3andStratosphericH2OConcentra.keywords: Historical, stratospheric, ozone, water vapour, O3, H2O, concentration
HistoricalO3andStratosphericH2OConcentra.label: Historical O3 and Stratospheric H2O Concentrations

86yrs2015-2100.description: Scenario, from 2015 to the end of the 21st century.
86yrs2015-2100.label: 2015-2100 86yrs

rcp34extoverForcing.description: Impose RCP3.4 overshoot extension forcing. The negative CO2 emissions level reached in 2100 by SSP5-3.4 remain constant at that level to 2150 and then increase linearly to zero by 2250.
rcp34extoverForcing.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 3.4 extension overshoot, future, scenario, SSP5, RCP3.4 extension overshoot
rcp34extoverForcing.label: RCP34 extension overshoot Forcing

RCP85aerEm.description: Impose changing emissions of RCP8.5 aerosols.
RCP85aerEm.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 8.5, future, 21st century, SSP5, RCP8.5, NTCF, aerosol, Emissions
RCP85aerEm.label: RCP85 Aerosol Emissions

HistoricalStratosphericAerosol.data_link: Stratospheric Aerosol Data Set (SADS Version 2) Prospectus
HistoricalStratosphericAerosol.description: Apply historical stratospheric aerosol concentrations from the stratospheric aerosol data set (SADS Version 2)
HistoricalStratosphericAerosol.label: Historical Stratospheric Aerosol

60yrs2040-2099.description: Scenario, from 2040 to the end of the 21st century.
60yrs2040-2099.label: 2040-2099 60 yrs

RCP85land.description: Impose changing RCP8.5 land use including crops, pasture, urban area, vegetation and forest.
RCP85land.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 8.5, future, 21st century, SSP5, RCP8.5, Land Use
RCP85land.label: RCP85 Land Use

HistoricalWMGHGConcentrations.description: Forcing data for concentration-driven historical CMIP6 runs. Here, we provide an outline of a consolidated set of atmospheric concentration time series for the long-lived greenhouse-gases, including CO2, CH4, N2O, HFCs, PFCs, SF6, several ODS, and NF3 to serve as input for the CMIP6 Historical simulations.
HistoricalWMGHGConcentrations.keywords: Historical, Well Mixed Greenhouse Gas, WMGHG
HistoricalWMGHGConcentrations.label: Historical WMGHG Concentrations

AOGCM-BGCConfiguration.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model with biogeochemistry
AOGCM-BGCConfiguration.keywords: AOGCM, BioGeoChemistry, AOGCM-BGC, Atmosphere-Ocean General Circulation Model
AOGCM-BGCConfiguration.label: AOGCM-BGC Configuration

1%yrCO2Increase.description: Impose a 1% per year increase in the concentration of atmospheric carbon dioxide until quadrupling.
1%yrCO2Increase.label: 1% per year CO2 Increase

RCP85wmGHGEm.description: Impose changing emissions of RCP8.5 long-lived greenhouse gases, including CO2, N2O and halogenated gases.
RCP85wmGHGEm.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 8.5, future, 21st century, SSP5, RCP8.5, Well-mixed Greenhouse Gas, CO2, Emissions
RCP85wmGHGEm.label: RCP85 Well Mixed GHG Emissions

1850COCarbonCycle.description: Impose repeating 1850 carbon dioxide (CO2) concentrations to carbon cycle model.
1850COCarbonCycle.keywords: 1850, CO2, concentration, pre-industrial, carbon cycle only
1850COCarbonCycle.label: 1850 CO2 for Carbon Cycle

piForcingExcludingCO2.keywords: Pre-industrial forcing, excluding carbon dioxide, excluding co2
piForcingExcludingCO2.label: Pre-Industrial Forcing Excluding CO2

FutureSolarIrradiance.data_link: SOLARIS-HEPPA Solar Forcing Data for CMIP6
FutureSolarIrradiance.description: The standard solar forcing dataset recommended for usage is the solar reference scenario dataset which includes future solar forcing (2015-2299).  Includes total solar irradiance, F10.7 cm solar radio flux, and spectral solar irradiance for 10-100000 nm range.
FutureSolarIrradiance.keywords: Solar Forcing, Future, Solar, Spectral Irradiance, SSI, TSI
FutureSolarIrradiance.label: Future Solar Irradiance Forcing

Historical greenhouse gas concentrations.description: Here, we provide consolidated data sets of historical atmospheric (volume) mixing ratios of 43 greenhouse gases specifically for the purpose of climate model runs.
Historical greenhouse gas concentrations.name: Historical greenhouse gas concentrations

SOLARIS-HEPPA Solar Forcing Data for CMI.description: An overview of the CMIP6 solar forcing dataset (irradiance as well as particle-related parameters) and guidelines for their usage.
SOLARIS-HEPPA Solar Forcing Data for CMI.name: SOLARIS-HEPPA Solar Forcing Data for CMIP6

IGAC/SPARC Chemistry-Climate Model Initi.description: Provides modellers with information and links to the IGAC/SPARC CCMI ozone database and nitrogen-deposition fields from preindustrial time to the future (1850-2100).
IGAC/SPARC Chemistry-Climate Model Initi.name: IGAC/SPARC Chemistry-Climate Model Initiative (CCMI) Forcing Databases in Support of CMIP6

Stratospheric Aerosol Data Set (SADS Ver.name: Stratospheric Aerosol Data Set (SADS Version 2) Prospectus

Land Use Harmonisation (LUH2 v1.0h) land.description: A new set of global gridded land-use forcing datasets are being developed to link historical land-use data and future projections in a standard format required by climate models.
Land Use Harmonisation (LUH2 v1.0h) land.name: Land Use Harmonisation (LUH2 v1.0h) land use forcing data (850-2100)
